title: IKodi Personal Blog
description: IKodi is my personal blog, where I share my knowledge writting posts about different tools, technologies and concepts related to the world of web development.

title: Full-Stack ToDo app
description: The typical ToDo application, but integrating client and server sides, with MongoDB Atlas as DB Cloud and the usual features: create, read, update and delete.

title: Minecraft Clone
description: A Minecraft clone based on the freeCodeCamp tutorial, using Three.js (a 2D/3D JavaScript library), React and TypeScript.

title: Tic Tac Toe
description: In this version of the well-known Tic Tac Toe, you can play versus the machine, store your points into your device, change players colors and some other funny features.

title: Connect Four
description: My version of the Connect Four game, implementing OOP with TypeScript and separating logic from view.

title: Crypto Assets
description: A simple dashboard to view your crypto address's transactions, with a minimalist design based on Material UI style guidelines.
